mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, John Augustine Washington III to Ann Pamela Cunningham, 1856 May 14
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Washington, John Augustine, III, 1821-1861
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Letter from John Augustine Washington III to Ann Pamela Cunningham, May 14, 1856. Autograph letter signed. Sends her Bushrod W. Herbert's address, recommends Newton's Mansion Hotel as best hotel in Alexandria, is cordial in anticipating her approaching visit. Declares he is determined to ignore the slanderous and untruthly statements made about him in the press.
